titleStmt.title: Description of Special Collections, Lehigh Codex 24: Antiphonal
titleStmt.funder: Council on Library and Information Resources

availability.licence: These images and the content of Special Collections Lehigh Codex 24: Antiphonal are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

To the extent possible under law, Lehigh University Libraries, Special Collections has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about Special Collections Lehigh Codex 24: Antiphonal. This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

supportDesc.extent: i+224; 428 x 323 mm bound to 448 x 325 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Early foliation in ink, upper right recto; fol. 1 missing, fol. 2 unnumbered; fols. 34, 82, 108-109, 121, 159 missing; 201 foliated as 210; 202 skipped in foliation with no leaf missing

p.catchwords: Horizontal catchwords in ink with simple ink decoration, lower center last verso

layoutDesc.layout: Seven four-line staves ruled in red with square notation and text in black; ruled in faint ink with double vertical bounding lines; written area: 304 x 202 mm

decoDesc.decoNote: [2r]Historiated initial S, Saint Anne in prayer
21vHistoriated initial O, Presentation in the Temple

binding.p: Original fifteenth-century binding; leather over wooden board, lower board; right half of upper board is missing and the remnant of the board has only fragments of the leather cover at the tail edge; part of front pastedown is now only attached at the inner edge, like a flyleaf; no leather over spine, thongs and sewing fully visible
